text: Yadi timile svasni manisaharula'i tiniharusamga samagama garnu ra mahara nirdharita garnu aghi nai talaka dinchau bhane timimathi kunai gunaha chaina, ho unala'i kehi ucita rakama avasya de'u (arthata) sampannale aphno samartha anusara de'os ra abhavagrastale aphno haisiyata anurupa, bhala'i garne manisaharuko nimti yo e'uta anivaryata ho
